posts.post_content:
*"Strictly better than Joven for being less color weighty. And in the same set, too."*   
   
Look more closely at the two cards: [Joven](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Joven) destroys non-creature artifacts, while Chandler kills artifact creatures. One isn't strictly better than the other.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Don't fall for his hideous grin, [it's a trap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=83142).  
  
By the way, i never noticed that he and his [complementary companion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=3006) have another thing in *common*: They're common legends.  
Something you will maybe not see ever again.  
*(I always thought they were Uncommon, but since the official Gatherer states otherwise i'm willing to believe this is correct.)*
